On each successive turn, if the creature is still grappled, you may use this move again (as an action) and automatically hit. A creature may attempt to excape the grapple at the beginning of its turns with a STR save against your Move DC.
Vice Grip.scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.

Vine Whip.description: You extend a sharp vine to whip the target with. This vine can strike anything within 15 feet of you. Make a melee attack roll, doing grass damage on a hit.
Vine Whip.scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.

Vital Throw.description: A slow fighting attack that pummels a creature. As an action on your turn, you hold this move until next turn, where it will automatically hit for fighting damage as long as the target remains in melee range.
Vital Throw.scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.

Volt Switch.description: You lash out with a quick, electric strike before you make a getaway. Make a melee attack, dealing electric damage on a hit. After this move is activated, a trainer must switch out the user as a free action.
Volt Switch.scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.

Volt Tackle.description: You rush forward in a flash of electricity with extended reach, slamming into a creature. When activating this move, you flash forward 15 feet and make a melee attack roll against a creature, dealing electric damage on a hit. On a hit, you also take a quarter of the total (rounded down) in typeless recoil damage.
Volt Tackle.scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 4d10 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.

Wake-Up Slap.description: You attack with a jolting slap from your palms. Make a melee attack on a creature, dealing fighting damage on a hit. If the target is asleep, double your Move modifier when adding damage, but the target automatically wakes up.
Wake-Up Slap.scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.

Water Gun.description: You fire a quick spurt of water at a creature in range. Make a ranged attack roll, doing water damage on a hit.
Water Gun.scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.

Water Pledge.description: You send a column of water towards a creature. Make a ranged attack, dealing water damage on a hit. After you land a hit, any ally that uses another Pledge move in the same round automatically hits.
Water Pledge.scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.

Water Pulse.description: You send a wave of ultrasonic aquatic energy at a creature in range. Make a ranged attack roll, dealing water damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 17 or higher, the target is confused.
Water Pulse.scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.

Water Shuriken.description: You fire a barrage of sharp shurikens at a target. Make a ranged attack roll, doing water damage on a hit. After successfully hitting a target, roll a d4. On a result of 3 or 4, another shuriken strikes the target for an additional water damage. Continue this process until you fail to roll a 3 or 4 on the d4 roll, up to a maximum of four additional hits.
Water Shuriken.scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d6 at level 5, 1d8 at level 10, and 2d6 at level 17.

Water Sport.description: You soak yourself and all allies with water, reducing the amount of fire damage taken for anyone affected. For the duration, you and any ally in range (when you initially activated this move) have resistance to fire-type attacks. If you were already resistant, you are now immune. If you were vulnerable, you now take normal damage. If you are immune to fire-type moves already, nothing happens.

Water Spout.description: You fire a blast of water at a creature that increases in power the more healthy you are. Make a ranged attack roll against a creature, doing water damage on a hit if you are at or above 50% of your health. If you are below 50%, halve the total damage done.
Water Spout.scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 5d6 at level 5, 4d12 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.

Waterfall.description: You create an intense waterfall that crashes down on creatures in a 10 foot radius, centered on a point within range. Creatures in the area must make a STR save against your Move DC or take water damage and fall prone on a fail, or half as much on a save.
Waterfall.scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.

Weather Ball.description: You send a powerful ball of energy that changes type based on the surrounding weather, dealing damage of that type. |Weather|Type| |:--:|:--: |Harsh Sunlight|Fire |Rain|Water |Sandstorm|Rock |Hail or Snow|Ice |Foggy or Cloudy|Normal
Weather Ball.scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.

Whirlpool.description: You create a wave of water that swirls around a creature in range. Make a ranged attack roll. On a hit, the target takes water damage and is restrained. At the beginning of each of its turns, it may attempt to escape with a STR save against your Move DC. On each successive turn, if the creature is still restrained, you may use this move again (as an action) and automatically hit.
Whirlpool.scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d10 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 5d4 at level 17.

Whirlwind.description: You create a whirlwind of spinning air around you, increasing your AC by +2  until the beginning of your next turn. When you activate this move, any creature within 5 feet of you must succeed on a STR saving throw against your Move DC or fall prone. In wild creature battles, this move can be activated to automatically count as a single success in a group DEX check to run away.

Wide Guard.description: You have the ability to guard your allies from area-of-effect moves. As a reaction, when a creature activates a damaging move that damages multiple allies within range, you may halve the damage dealt. On future instances of this reaction in the same combat, you must roll higher than a 15 on a d20 roll or forfeit the reaction with no effect

Wild Charge.description: You shroud yourself in electricity and charge at a creature. Make a melee attack, dealing electric damage on a hit, but taking 1/4 of the damage (rounded down) in typeless recoil.
Wild Charge.scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.

Will-O-Wisp.description: You send a sinister, white-hot flame at a creature attempting to inflict a burn. Make a ranged attack roll on a target, causing burn on a hit.

Wing Attack.description: You strike out at a target creature with your wings. Make a melee attack roll, doing flying damage on a hit.
Wing Attack.scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.

Wish.description: You send forth a healing wish that takes time to come true. At the end of your next turn, as a free action, heal a target in range for hit points.
Wish.scaling: Higher Levels: The healing dice roll for this move changes to 5d6 at level 5, 4d12 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.

Withdraw.description: When subject to a melee or ranged attack, you can spend your reaction to increase your AC by +2 if it would cause the attack to miss.
Withdraw.scaling: Higher Levels: Increase your AC by +3 at level 10 and above.

Wonder Room.description: You create a bizarre vibe in the air in a 100 foot circle, centered on you. For the duration, all WIS saves become CON saves and all CON saves become WIS saves.

Wood Hammer.description: You slam your rough body against a creature, taking serious recoil damage. Make an attack roll against a target, dealing grass damage on a hit. On a hit, you also take a quarter of the damage dealt in typeless recoil damage.
Wood Hammer.scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 4d10 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.

Work Up.description: You get your adrenaline pumping and go into a frenzy. While worked up, you add +2 to all attack rolls. Your worked up status ends if you are incapacitated or if you have not attacked a hostile target since your last turn, or taken any damage since then.

Worry Seed.description: You shoot a bizarre seed that implants worry into another creature. The target must succeed on a CON save against your Move DC or replace the user's choice of ability with "Insomnia", preventing sleep for the duration.

Wrap.description: You attempt to grapple a target into submission. Make a melee attack roll. On a hit, the target takes normal damage and is grappled. At the beginning of each of its turns, it may attempt to escape with a STR save against your Move DC. As long as the target is grappled on your subsequent turns, this move can be activated again as a bonus action with an automatic hit, dealing normal damage.
Wrap.scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice rolls for this move change to 1d6 at level 5, 1d8 at level 10, and 2d6 at level 17.

Wring Out.description: You wrap your hands around the target and squeeze hard. Make a melee attack against a creature, dealing normal damage on a hit. If the target has 50% or more of its maximum HP, double your move modifier for the damage roll.
Wring Out.scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 5d6 at level 5, 4d12 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.

X-Scissor.description: You cross your claws for a scissor-like slashing attack. Make a melee attack against a creature, dealing bug damage on a hit.
X-Scissor.scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.

Yawn.description: You release a big yawn that causes a creature to become very drowsy. Choose a target in range. If that target is still in the battle after the end of its next turn, it falls asleep.

Zap Cannon.description: You fire out an extreme blast of pure electric energy at a creature. Make a ranged attack against a target in range, doing electric damage. If the natural attack roll is 15 or higher, the target is paralyzed.
Zap Cannon.scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 4d10 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.

Zen Headbutt.description: You focus all of your willpower into your head and ram it into a creature. Make a melee attack, dealing psychic damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 17 or higher, the target flinches.
Zen Headbutt.scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.

Zing Zap.description: A strong electric blast crashes down on two unique targets in range, giving them an electric shock. Make two ranged attacks, dealing electric damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 18 or higher, the target flinches.
Zing Zap.scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
